attributes.action: Reinstate Soldier wrongfully sacked from the Army over Tommy Robinson selfie.
attributes.background:
A young Soldier was wrongfully sacked from the British Army over a selfie with a civilian (Tommy Robinson).

The Soldier did not break any laws, was singled out.

This was brought about a civilian organisation for their our political reasons.

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions that ask for someone to be given or to lose their job.

In any case, this would not be the responsibility of the UK Government or Parliament. This would be the responsibility of the Army.
